subject: College Athletics
Cheating
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tom Green has been fired as the basketball coach at Fairleigh Dickinson after leading the Knights to 407 victories and 4 N.C.A.A. tournament appearances in 26 years.
snippet: Tom Green has been fired as the basketball coach at Fairleigh Dickinson after leading the Knights to 407 victories and 4 N.C.A.A. tournament appearances in 26 years.
